name: R-Survive
description:
This game is about a boy who wakes up in a dream that all his toys have come to life.

Fun engaging survival shooter android game.

 It uses your android device's gyroscope for the VR effect.

How to play:

Move your phone like the way you look around when you wear a VR headset

Touch and hold to shoot Joystick controller for movement

play the game while standing for best experience.
